120.text: As the professional conservationist that you surely are, you must turn this bare plot into a thriving ecosystem.

220.text: Invasive species will be spawning soon! But if you construct an ecosystem that is resilient enough, you may be able to survive.

320.text: You can buy plants and items from the shop using your 'OSA points' and place them in your plot!

420.text: These plants may provide food, defense, or even attack your enemies. Every plant improves the number of currency you receive per turn.

520.text: Make sure to have a large variety of different plants in your plot- diversity in an ecosystem only makes you stronger!

620.text: You win the game once you reach the threshold amount of currency- you can check your progress in the top-left of your screen!
